metadata.title: CVE-2023-2020 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient permission checks in the REST API in Tribe29 Checkmk <=2.1.0p27 and <= 2.2.0b4 (beta) allow unauthorized users to scheduledowntimes for any host.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
